name: Sange and Yasha
lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

descriptions.name: Greater Maim
descriptions.description: Each attack has a 40% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by -26% and attack speed by -26 when used by a melee hero. Reduces enemy hero movement by -13% and attack speed by -13 when used by a ranged hero. Effect lasts 5.0 seconds.
